Bom Ditemukan di Lokasi Syuting Film Terbaru Marvel
05 Nov 2019, 14:59 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi bom. (AFP/Mahmud SALEH)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Sebuah bom ditemukan di dekat lokasi syuting film adaptasi komik Marvel bertajuk The Eternals di Spanyol. Bom itu ditemukan dalam kondisi tidak meledak.Melansir The Sun, bom tersebut berada berada di Pulau Canary. Diduga bom yang harus dievakuasi oleh para ahli itu sudah ada sejak Perang Dunia II.Semua orang yang berada di lokasi syuting saat itu langsung dievakuasi ke lokasi aman. Pun begitu dengan aktor Richard Madden dan aktris Angelina Jolie yang tengah menjalani syuting."Jelas itu sangat mengerikan, bisa saja bom itu sudah di sana selama beberapa dekade tanpa tersentuh, tapi siapa yang tahu apa yang mungkin terjadi bila bom terganggu," kata sumber di lokasi kepada The Sun.Sumber tersebut melanjutkan, "Beberapa bintang besar dunia [tengah berada] di lokasi syuting dan tidak ada yang mengambil risiko. Untungnya, [bom] ditangani para ahli."The Eternals pertama kali dikenalkan lewat komik bertajuk The Eternals #1 yang rilis pada Juli 1976. Komik dan karakter di dalamnya dibuat oleh penulis sekaligus komikus Jack Kirby.The Eternals merupakan tim pahlawan super yang terdiri dari sejumlah spesies fiksi. Di dalamnya terdapat banyak karakter, di antaranya ada Ikaris, Thena, Ajak, Kingo, Sprite, Phastos, Gilgamesh dan Makkari.Chloe Zhao dipandang mumpuni untuk menyutradarai The Eternals. Dalam pengerjaan proyek ini, Zhao akan dibantu oleh penulis Matthew dan Ryan Firpo yang menggarap naskah.Selain Jolie dan Madden, masih ada sederet aktor dan aktris kenamaan internasional. Mereka adalah Kit Harington, Salma Hayek, Brian Tyree Henry, Kumail Nanjiani, Lauren Ridloff dan Don Lee. (adp/rea)

Bomb found at the latest Marvel movie set
05 Nov 2019, 14:59 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Bomb illustration. (AFP / Mahmud SALE)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - A bomb was found near the set of the Marvel comic film adaptation titled The Eternals in Spain. The bomb was found in an unexploded condition. Launching The Sun, the bomb was located on Canary Island. Allegedly the bomb that had to be evacuated by experts had been around since World War II. Everyone who was on the set when it was immediately evacuated to a safe location. Even so with actor Richard Madden and actress Angelina Jolie who were undergoing filming. "Obviously it was very terrible, the bomb could have been there for decades without being touched, but who knows what might happen if the bomb is interrupted," said a source in location to The Sun. The source continued, "Some of the world's big stars [are on the set] and no one is taking risks. Luckily, [the bomb] was handled by experts." The Eternals were first introduced through the comic titled The Eternals # 1 which was released in July 1976. The comic and the characters in it were made by writer and comic artist Jack Kirby. The Eternals are a team of superheroes consisting of a number of fictional species. Inside there are many characters, including Ikaris, Thena, Ajak, Kingo, Sprite, Phastos, Gilgamesh and Makkari. Chloe Zhao is considered qualified to direct The Eternals. In working on this project, Zhao will be assisted by writers Matthew and Ryan Firpo who worked on the manuscript. Besides Jolie and Madden, there are still a series of internationally renowned actors and actresses. They are Kit Harington, Salma Hayek, Brian Tyree Henry, Kumail Nanjiani, Lauren Ridloff and Don Lee. (adp / rea)
